description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0510 ( Blood Product Dispense Status)
name: v2 Blood Product Dispense Status

text.div:
Blood Product Dispense Status

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
CR Released into inventory for general availabilityStatus determined by Filleradded v2.5
DS Dispensed to patient locationStatus determined by Filleradded v2.5
PT Presumed transfused (dispensed and not returned)Status determined by Filleradded v2.5
RA Returned unused/no longer neededStatus determined by Filleradded v2.5
RD Reserved and ready to dispenseStatus determined by Filleradded v2.5
RE Released (no longer allocated for the patient)Status determined by Placer or Filleradded v2.5
RI Received into inventory (for specified patient)Status determined by Filleradded v2.5
RL Returned unused/keep linked to patient for possible use laterStatus determined by Filleradded v2.5
RQ Request to dispense blood productStatus determined by Placeradded v2.5
RS Reserved (ordered and product allocated for the patient)Status determined by Filleradded v2.5
WA Wasted (product no longer viable)Status determined by Filleradded v2.5
